sn35.70:1.1: Atha kho ayasma upavano yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe…
sn35.70:1.2: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma upavano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.70:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sanditthiko dhammo hoti, akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti?
sn35.70:2.1: “Idha pana, upavana, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva rupappatisamvedi ca hoti ruparagappatisamvedi ca.
sn35.70:2.2: Santanca ajjhattam rupesu ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam rupesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:2.3: Yam tam, upavana, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva rupappatisamvedi ca hoti ruparagappatisamvedi ca.
sn35.70:2.4: Santanca ajjhattam rupesu ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam rupesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:2.5: Evampi kho, upavana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi …pe….
sn35.70:3.1: Puna caparam, upavana, bhikkhu jivhaya rasam sayitva rasappatisamvedi ca hoti rasaragappatisamvedi ca.
sn35.70:3.2: Santanca ajjhattam rasesu ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam rasesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:3.3: Yam tam, upavana, bhikkhu jivhaya rasam sayitva rasappatisamvedi ca hoti rasaragappatisamvedi ca.
sn35.70:3.4: Santanca ajjhattam rasesu ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam rasesu rago’ti pajanati. Evampi kho, upavana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi …pe….
sn35.70:4.1: Puna caparam, upavana, bhikkhu manasa dhammam vinnaya dhammappatisamvedi ca hoti dhammaragappatisamvedi ca.
sn35.70:4.2: Santanca ajjhattam dhammesu ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam dhammesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:4.3: Yam tam, upavana, bhikkhu manasa dhammam vinnaya dhammappatisamvedi ca hoti dhammaragappatisamvedi ca.
sn35.70:4.4: Santanca ajjhattam dhammesu ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam dhammesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:4.5: Evampi kho, upavana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti …pe… paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi …pe….
sn35.70:5.1: Idha pana, upavana, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva rupappatisamvedi ca hoti, no ca ruparagappatisamvedi.
sn35.70:5.2: Asantanca ajjhattam rupesu ragam ‘natthi me ajjhattam rupesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:5.3: Yam tam, upavana, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva rupappatisamvedihi kho hoti, no ca ruparagappatisamvedi.
sn35.70:5.4: Asantanca ajjhattam rupesu ragam ‘natthi me ajjhattam rupesu rago’ti pajanati.
sn35.70:5.5: Evampi kho, upavana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti, akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi …pe….
